content: Chen, Haopeng | REINS REINS REliable, INtelligent and Scalable Systems Group Home People Publications Researches Courses Cooperation REINS News About REINS Home Chen, Haopeng REINS Director Join Year: 2004 chen-hp AT sjtu.edu.cn About Him Associate Professor of School of Software (021) 34204124 Room 1111, Software Building, Shanghai Jiao Tong University 800 Dongchuan RD, SH, P.R.China, 200240 [ researches | group people | courses ] Areas of Study Software Engineering, Distributed Computing Bio He received his Ph.D degree from Department of Computer Science and Engineering, Northwestern Polytechinal University in 2001. He has worked in School of Software, Shanghai Jiao Tong University since 2004 after he finished his two-year postdoctoral research job in Department of Computer Science and Engineering, Shanghai Jiao Tong University. He got the position of Associate Professor in 2008. In 2010, he studied and researched in Georgia Institute of Technology as a visiting scholar. His research group focuses on Distributed Computing and Software Engineering. They have kept researching on Web Services, Web 2.0, Java EE, .NET, and SOA for several years. Recently, they are also interested in cloud computing and researching on the relevant areas, such as cloud federation, resource management, dynamic scaling up and down, and so on.
